newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: COLOMBIA VEHICLE SALES UP 13.3 PCT IN JAN-JULY.
newsitem.headline: COLOMBIA VEHICLE SALES UP 13.3 PCT IN JAN-JULY.

text.p: Vehicle sales in Colombia increased 13.3 percent to 77,492 in the first seven months of 1997 compared to 68,407 sales in the same period last year, industry sources said Monday.

Colmotores, the Colombia-based assembler of Chevrolet vehicles, had 30.7 percent of the market. CCA, assemblers of Mazda had 15 percent of the market while Renault assembler had 14.9 percent of the market. Korean manufacturer Daewoo had a 7.3 percent market share while Ford had 7.2 percent. Hyundai had a 5.5 percent share. The remaining 19.4 percent of vehicles sold in Colombia in the January to July period were imported, a statement from Colmotores said.
